entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: N 14 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
